title: Asian Women In Business (AWIB) Annual Holiday Party
desc: It is that time of the year again when we gather for a merry evening of feasting, networking, and celebrating the end of a good year.? For our 2015 party, we have a grand space at a West Village gallery with a holiday themed art exhibition.  ?For your tasting enjoyment, we will have a variety of food and liquid stations.? Enjoy dishes by Mokbar, Momokawa Restaurant, Vanessa's Dumpling House, Yunnan BBQ and more. Our liquid stations will have Joto Sake, Royal King Chinese Tea, Teeling Irish Whiskey, Tiger Beer and Wine for the World; and sommeliers and masters will guide your experience as we do pairings with Asian cuisine. We are pleased to feature Rose Jia, Founder of? Whiskey Me Up , who will be teaming up with? Teeling Irish Whiskey ?to conduct a tasting to find your whiskey persona. Join us for a memorable celebration. Venue Tenri Cultural Institute 43A West 13th Street (Between 5th and 6th Ave) New York City 6:00 pm - 10:00 pm Includes?food and liquid stations View the? event invitation Registration is required.?To RSVP, please visit? http://awib.org/events .
